ygData.subject: Re: possible big cheat for EQ....
ygData.msgSnippet: ... SNIP SNIP ... Not entirely true. Being ex-military, and being an ex-intelligence type, and having been trained/shown how to do it, cracking network
ygData.messageBody:
>From: "Dmitry M. Devishev" <dmitry@...>

SNIP SNIP

>You do not need to hack EQ program to cheat, you can hack network
> >protocol. All vital data flow through protocol and it is much easier >to
>decode than program itself. But protocol can be crypted, and >impossible to
>decode at all..

Not entirely true. Being ex-military, and being an ex-intelligence type, and
having been trained/shown how to do it, cracking network protocol and
network protocol encryption is not as hard as you think it is. But don't get
me wrong. It's not something that you can just hop on a computer and learn
overnight or in just a few hours. You have to know what you're looking for,
and then, just maybe then, you can figure it out on your own. It would take
months, or possibly even years to learn how on your own.
